data.title: Steven Spielberg Presents Pinky and The Brain
data.meta_description: Cartoon chaos with the genius mouse and his stupid sidekick who try to conquer the world each night.
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Das Mouse

Pinky and The Brain go undersea in a submarine to find the key ingredient for a hypnotic pancake batter.

20 min Â· Sep 8, 1995 G

EPISODE 2

Of Mouse And Man

The Brain gets a job at a large corporation and schemes to collect workmen's compensation in order to fund another plan to take over the world.

20 min Â· Sep 9, 1995 G

EPISODE 3

Tokyo Grows/That Smarts/Brainstem

In Tokyo in the 1950s, The Brain reverses a miniaturization ray to create monsters to scare the city and then rescue it. Trouble occurs when a real monster arrives.

21 min Â· Sep 16, 1995 G

EPISODE 4

Pinky & The Fog/Where No Mouse Has Gone Before/Cheese Roll Call

In the 1930s, The Brain poses as The Fog and plots to broadcast his hypnotic voice over the radio./Pinky and The Brain alter the inscription on a space probe to show themselves as the dominant species.

20 min Â· Nov 4, 1995 G

EPISODE 5

Brainania

To fund their latest scheme, Pinky and The Brain establish a bogus country in order to receive massive foreign aid from the United States.

20 min Â· Nov 11, 1995 G
